title: Taming
description: I can only run from my past for so long. Eventually my Demons always find me. Unfortunately, that Demon has hired three insufferable dragon shifters to bring me back to him. I just have to hide my secrets a little longer. I just have to pretend to help these assholes find the person they’re looking for without letting them know the truth. They’re on the hunt for a dangerous Mage. Just wait until they find out the Mage they’re hunting is actually me … This is a Reverse Harem series containing M/M themes. Recommended for readers 18 and over. REVIEWS "Absolutely FABULOUS!! Taming is everything one could want in a book. Laughter, love, intrigue, strong FMC, sexy men dragon shifters, demons mages and wonderful mystical creatures." "I'm so in love with these characters (Especially Rime! And Chaos... Oh just all of them!) I definitely recommend this series to anyone who loves a strong female character, magic, sexy men, and dragons!" "I can't say enough about this story. Such a great start to a series, Mages, dragons, Demons, Fate, Hellhounds and all manner of supernatural, twists and turns youre not expecting especially the ending THAT ENDING IS EPIC!"
author: A.K. Koonce
